Class FormatStr

  • java.lang.Object
    • FormatStr

  • public class FormatStr
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the methods or tools to format a string.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FormatStr(java.lang.String str, java.lang.String pattern)
      This constructor initializes the instance variables str, pattern and strFormat.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void formatString()
      This method formats the string using the pattern that the user entered.
      java.lang.String getStrFormat()
      Gets the formatted string.
      void setPattern(java.lang.String pattern)
      This method sets the pattern.
      void setStrFormatToDefault()
      This method sets the string formatted to default.
